The Immersion Hand Blender is a kitchen essential designed for effortless blending, pureeing, and mixing.

This handheld blender boasts a 500-watt motor making it a must-have tool for various blending and mixing tasks.

With its sleek and ergonomic design, these handheld appliance offers the convenience of easy operation directly in pots, pitchers, or bowls, eliminating the need for transferring ingredients to a separate blender.

To be paired with our small but powerful motors*, it effortlessly tackles various culinary tasks, from smoothies, soups, and sauces to creamy dips and whipped toppings.

Its compact size and detachable parts make cleaning a breeze, while the intuitive controls ensure precise blending at different speeds for the perfect texture every time.

Ideal for professional chefs and home cooks, the immersion blender is the go-to tool for achieving smooth and consistent results with minimal effort.

• 300mm tube

• POWER: 350 W / 240 V / 50 Hz

• Speed: 4000 – 16000 RPM

• Voltage: 220V/50 Hz or 110V/60 Hz

• Power: 500W

• Net weight: 3.1 kgs
